item.title: Backbone.js + Ruby on Rails Tips
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: Add initializer that disable sending data in namespaces in json. ActiveRecord::Base.include_root_in_json = false # {"post": {"title": "some title", "content": "some content"}} # will be # {"title": "some title", "content": "some content} Use attr_accessible for filtering attributes in mass assigments from backbone. In rails > 3.1 you can use attr_accessible with :as => role. Use inherited resources for faster development.
